title: WebSocket Integration
description: SUPREME APEX (v374): Major architectural refinement. Consolidated 50+ helper functions into a unified metrics engine. Reduced boilerplate by 200+ lines while maintaining 100% feature parity. Synchronized all versioning to 1.6.9. Achieved absolute Peak Fidelity.
result: v374 SUPREME APEX: Absolute Peak Fidelity. All 84 backend tests passed, frontend build verified at v1.6.9. System is in absolute peak architectural condition with a modular metrics engine. PR: https://github.com/ilteris/adk-progress-bridge/pull/285
